oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Women Throughout the Month of November
المرأة في شهر
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bint Al Nil
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This article presents women-related news covering the past month, including coverage of an event that took place at the Greek Embassy with only 18 invitees and a brief feature of the wife of the British Ambassador to Egypt and her passion for sports.
تستعرض المقالة الأخبار المتعلقة بالمرأة خلال شهر نوفمبر المنصرم، وتشمل تغطية لحفل أقيم بالسفارة اليونانية واقتصر على 18 مدعوًا، وفقرة عن زوجة السفير البريطاني في القاهرة وحبها للرياضة.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; The American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
